page.title: 18Chatteris - Spinning a Yarn
page.content:
Members of Chatteris' Business and Professional Women's Association, spun a yarn at their summer evening on Monday 24th of June. The meeting was held in Cromwell Community College and the guest speaker was Mrs Ryder who showed members how to spin.
She produced two sweaters made from one sheep's fleece. She said the wool had to be washed, carded, teased and stretched before being wound into skeins. It was then dyed and washed again.
The Club produced a concert on Friday 28th June. Entertainment was provided by the Georgillian Singers. All the proceeds from the event were given to the local CAMTAD group (Campaign for Tackling Acquired Deafness). The meeting was well attended.
